name: PENN'S MARKET I, L.P., Penn's Market II, L.P., Kurt L. McLaughlin and Herbert J. Farber Associates, Inc., Appellees v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Penn's Market I, L.P. v. Harleysville Mutual Insurance

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD and MCCAFFERY, JJ.
parties: PENN’S MARKET I, L.P., Penn’s Market II, L.P., Kurt L. McLaughlin and Herbert J. Farber Associates, Inc., Appellees v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Charles W. Craven, Esq., Marshall, Dennehey, Warner, Coleman & Goggin, P.C., Philadelphia, for Harleysville Mutual Insurance Company.
Steven D. Urgo, Esq., Louis B. Kupperman, Esq., Obermayer, Rebmann Maxwell & Hippel, L.L.P.; James C. Sargent, Jr., Esq., Lamb McErlane, P.C., Philadelphia, for Penn’s Market I, L.P., et al.

944 A.2d 754
PENN’S MARKET I, L.P., Penn’s Market II, L.P., Kurt L. McLaughlin and Herbert J. Farber Associates, Inc., Appellees v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 14, 2008.
Decided April 18, 2008.

Steven D. Urgo, Esq., Louis B. Kupperman, Esq., Obermayer, Rebmann Maxwell & Hippel, L.L.P.; James C. Sargent, Jr., Esq., Lamb McErlane, P.C., Philadelphia, for Penn’s Market I, L.P., et al.
